errors.minUsernameError: Username must be at least 3 characters long
errors.maxUsernameError: Username must be at most 20 characters long

errors.maxDisplayNameError: Display name must be at most 20 characters long

errors.minPasswordError: Password must be at least 6 characters long
errors.maxPasswordError: Password must be at most 100 characters long
